response.job_title: Customer Service Front Office Lead at GSK
response.summary: International Trade Professional with experience in OTM process for Technology, Tobacco and High Risk Product Sector, Risk Management and LSS (Land Side Services) / VAS (Value Added Services) operations. International Trade Professional with experience in foreign trade management, logistics and supply, customs administration, personnel and suppliers management applying Risk Management models and implementing advantages by my role such as Internal Auditor in norm BASC version 03 – 2008 and ISO 9001 2008. Dynamic professional based on goals focused on accomplishment objectives and search substantial improvements to the organization. Excellent learning ability and coupling to new processes and/or professional challenges. I consider myself a very competitive and responsible person with the aim of leaving my positive mark in each organization in order to create an excellent reputation and professional image.
response.skills: Administración y dirección de empresas, Administración de la cadena de suministro, Administración logística, Análisis financiero, Análisis de datos, Análisis de negocio, Aprovisionamiento, Capacidad de análisis, Comercio internacional, Courage, Eficiencia operativa, Estrategia empresarial, Estrategia de mercadotecnia, Experiencia en implementación, Exportaciones, Facilidad de adaptación, Habilidades sociales, Importaciones, Incoterms, Informes de gastos

profile_positions.description: Liderar la implementación de la estrategia de reporting y master data para el equipo de Customer Service garantizando viabilidad de la data y la optimización de recursos físicos y de personal. Administrar eficientemente el proceso de logística inversa, cartera y disputas.
profile_positions.title: Data & Reporting Customer Service Lead at Haleon

profile_positions.description: Liderar la implementación de la estrategia para el manejo integral de la relación entre Haleon y el cliente final con el fin de incrementar el servicio y disponibilidad de producto en el cliente, reducir costos logísticos, desarrollar nuevas iniciativas de valor logístico para Haleon e implementar planes de colaboración de acuerdo a la estrategia de la compañía. Administrar eficientemente el proceso de logística inversa, cartera, disputas y Master Data.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Front Office Lead

profile_positions.description: Liderar la implementación de la estrategia para el manejo integral de la relación entre GlaxoSmithKline Consumer Healthcare y el cliente final de GSK con el fin de incrementar el servicio y disponibilidad de producto en el cliente, reducir costos logísticos, desarrollar nuevas iniciativas de valor logístico para GSK CH e implementar planes de colaboración de acuerdo a la estrategia de la compañía. Administrar eficientemente el proceso de logística inversa, cartera, disputas y Master Data.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Front Office Lead

profile_positions.description: Encargado de liderar el equipo de Backoffice y monitorear el ciclo completo de la orden, asegurando la recepción y manejo de la documentación para procesamiento de órdenes, devoluciones, Quejas y Manejos de Data Maestra y Facturación Electrónica.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Backoffice Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Functions:
•	Control and supervise Logistic Supplier for the entire supply chain of the four divisions of the company (Animal Health, Consumer Health, Pharma and Radiology).
•	Control and supervise Inbound, Storage, Inventories, Dispatch, Returns and Scrapping Process of commercial products, medical samples, samples without commercial value and promotional material.
•	Analysis and management of expiration date of products by each division.
•	Measuring and Accomplish KPIS include OTIF (On Time In Full).
•	Logistics Cost Optimization.

Achievements:
•	Improvement of the Logistic Supplier service level for the four divisions of the company.
•	Increase in storage capacity of cold room for the divisions of Animal Health and Pharma.
•	Optimization of the logistics times in each processes.
•	Inventory regulation, storage optimization and improvement logistic and supply processes for the promotional material.
•	Design and implementation of new SOP’s for the whole operation.
•	Participation and fulfillment for OEA certification.
•	Standardization of the inventories adjustments and scrapping process applying the technologies tools advantages.
•	Estimate savings around € 39.000 per year in logistic costs per products destructions.
•	Fulfillment of each project assigned by organization.
profile_positions.title: Warehouse Coordinator BHC

profile_positions.description:
Functions:
•	Standardization pricing processes for all company services such as Value Added Services, Land Side Services, Multimodal Transport Operations, Sea and Air.
•	Align optimally cost and sale in each operation include suppliers offers.
•	Sales Team Support.
•	Orientation, advice and follow up to the commercial offers to customers.
•	Support to each regional teams in Pricing and Cost Controlling processes.
•	Prepare daily reports and KPIS.

Achievements:
•	Reduction in commercial offers issues both customers and suppliers.
•	Standardization of the costing process of each regional operation.
profile_positions.title: Pricing Analyst & Cost Controller

profile_positions.description:
Functions:
•	Operations Follow Up with the respective sending and documental support revision for customs clearance process generating daily reports and alerts to customers by each operations.
•	Guarantee the necessary resources for airport and port formalities, management and assignment operative personnel, logistics and supply providers and other required plans.
•	Management and coordination of the customs process and foreign trade in airlines and shipping lanes.
•	Ensure the operation lead time and invoicing according to the offer and agreed service level.
•	Execute monthly accomplishment goals reports, KPI´s analysis and generation of corrective and improvement action plans.
•	Guide and advice to the customers.
•	Platform technologies administration for documental control (FTP Server Inditex Colombia) and global customs Web.

Achievements:
•	Design and successful implementation of the operative and commercial processes for Inditex account.
•	New operation successful implementation includes optimal suppliers and business partners.
•	Confidence increase to the customer reducing operative process complexity.
•	Successful accomplishment of the KPI’s proposed to customer.
•	New structures and procedures design for the customs controversies solution in record time.
•	Coaching and training to the business partner (Customs agent) for increase the successful of our operations.
•	Invoicing in record time and in line of each operations.
profile_positions.title: Account Coordinator Inditex Colombia

profile_positions.description:
Coordinador In House de Cuentas Especiales. (Sony, British American Tobbaco, Zubiola, Puma, Masterfoods, Llantas Unidas, Becton Dickinson).
Functions:
•	Documental coordination of each MTO (Multimodal Transit Operations) for port procedures, transport and security plans.
•	Management of empty containers handling.
•	Inspections coordination in each container opening verifying the external and internal container status, seals and delivery goods by suppliers transport to the warehouse.
•	Follow up to the each operation to customers through daily reports and alerts.
•	Ensure the operation lead time and invoicing according to the offer and agreed service level.
•	Execute monthly accomplishment goals reports, KPI´s analysis and generation of corrective and improvement action plans.
•	Guide and advice to the customers.
•	Management and control of land transport, security, customs and GPS suppliers.

Achievements:
•	Customer’s loyalty and excellent operative and commercial results.
•	KPI’s sustainability
•	Zero transport thefts in each assigned accounts.
•	Excellent reputation and references of each customer.
•	Specialization in OTM management and Risk Management.
profile_positions.title: Coordinador In House de Cuentas Especiales

profile_positions.description:
Functions:
•	Export Coordination of Perishable Products by Air transport.
•	Documental and customs management of exports include Phytosanitary and Origin Criterion Procedures.
•	Origin Criterion Procedures through MUISCA Web
•	Control and file of Air Will Bill.
•	Customer service.
•	General Assistance in Quality and Security Systems (ISO 9001 2008, BASC 03-2008 - 3)

Achievements:
•	Implementation and successful sustainability of the integrated management system.
•	Audits performed to 100% of all business partners.
profile_positions.title: Coordinador de Operaciones y de Sistemas de Gestión
